information.name: Cisco Library Emporium
information.description: Step into the world of networking and technology at Cisco Library Emporium. Discover a treasure trove of resources on networking, cybersecurity, and IT infrastructure. From beginner guides to advanced manuals, our curated selection of books offers something for everyone interested in mastering Cisco technologies.

product.title: CCNA 200-301 Official Cert Guide Library
product.author: Wendell Odom, David Hucaby, Jason Gooley
product.description: Cisco Press has the only study guides approved by Cisco for the new CCNA certification. The new edition of the best-selling two-book value-priced CCNA 200-301 Official Cert Guide Library, Second Edition presents you with an organized test-preparation routine using proven series elements and techniques.

product.title: Kali Linux for Beginners
product.author: Jowanna Lewis
product.description: Most of the big companies today seek the help of Kali Linux for the purpose of tracing and checking the various forms of vulnerabilities which are present within a system and thus ensures 100 percent security for an organization. Unless and until you are unaware of the basics, you will not be able to use this software.

product.title: Cisco Certified DevNet Associate DEVASC 200-901
product.author: Chris Jackson
product.description: Cisco Certified DevNet Associate DEVASC 200-901 Official Cert Guide presents you with an organized test preparation routine using proven series elements and techniques.

product.title: CCNP Enterprise Wireless Design ENWLSD 300-425
product.author: Jerome Henry
product.description: Trust the best-selling Official Cert Guide series from Cisco Press to help you learn, prepare, and practice for the CCNP Enterprise Wireless ENWLSD 300-425 and ENWLSI 300-430 exams.

product.title: Cisco Certified Support Technician (CCST) Networking 100-150
product.author: Allan Johnson
product.description: most practical way to understand the Cisco Certified Support Technician (CCST) Networking certification process, to commit to taking your CCST Networking 200-301 exam, and to finish your preparation using a variety of primary and supplemental study resources.

product.title: CCNP and CCIE Security Core SCOR 350-701 Official Cert Guide
product.author: Omar Santos
product.description: Trust the best-selling Official Cert Guide series from Cisco Press to help you learn, prepare, and practice for the CCNP and CCIE Security Core SCOR 350-701 exam.

product.title: Cisco Certified Support Technician (CCST) Cybersecurity 100-160 Official Cert Guide
product.author: Shane Sexton
product.description: Trust the best-selling Official Cert Guide series from Cisco Press to help you learn, prepare, and practice for the CCST Cybersecurity 100-160 exam.

product.title: CCNP Enterprise Core ENCOR 350-401 and Advanced Routing ENARSI 300-410 Official Cert Guide Library
product.author: Brad Edgeworth
product.description: isco Press has the only Study Guides approved by Cisco for the new CCNP Enterprise Certification.

product.title: CCNP Enterprise Advanced Routing ENARSI 300-410 Official Cert Guide
product.author: Brad Edgeworth
product.description: Trust the best-selling Official Cert Guide series from Cisco Press to help you learn, prepare, and practice for the 300-410 ENARSI exam.

product.title: Cisco Certified DevNet Professional DEVCOR 350-901 Official Cert Guide
product.author: Hazim Dahir
product.description: Cisco Certified DevNet Professional DEVCOR 350-901 Official Cert Guide presents you with an organized test preparation routine using proven series elements and techniques
